database_name.description: The name of the database in the AWS Glue Data Catalog where the table is located.

description.description: A brief description of the table, which can provide context about its contents or purpose.

name.description: The name of the table in the AWS Glue Data Catalog.

owner.description: The owner of the table, which could be a person, team, or department responsible for the table.

parameters.description: A set of key-value pairs that provide additional metadata or configuration for the table.

retention.description: The number of days to retain the table data, after which it may be automatically deleted.

table_type.description: The type of the table, such as 'EXTERNAL_TABLE' or 'VIRTUAL_VIEW', indicating how the table is managed or accessed.

view_expanded_text.description: The SQL text of the expanded view, representing how the view is defined in terms of underlying tables.

view_original_text.description: The original SQL text used to define the view, which may include variables and expressions.

open_table_format_input.description: Configuration for the open_table_format_input block containing iceberg_input settings.
open_table_format_input.type: list(object({ iceberg_input: object({ metadata_operation: string, version: string }) }))

partition_index.description: List of partition_index configurations, each containing index_name and keys.

partition_keys.description: List of partition_keys configurations with an optional comment and type, and a required name.
partition_keys.type: list(object({ comment : string, name : string, type : string }))

storage_descriptor.description: Configuration for the storage_descriptor block including storage details, columns, schema_reference, ser_de_info, skewed_info, and sort_columns.
storage_descriptor.type: list(object({ additional_locations: optional(list(string)), bucket_columns: optional(list(string)), compressed: optional(bool), input_format: optional(string), location: optional(string), number_of_buckets: optional(number), output_format: optional(string), parameters: optional(map(string)), stored_as_sub_directories: optional(bool), columns: optional(list(object({ comment: optional(string), name: string, parameters: optional(map(string)), type: string }))), schema_reference: optional(list(object({ schema_version_number: number, schema_id: object({ schema_arn: string }) }))), ser_de_info: optional(list(object({ name: string, parameters: optional(map(string)), serialization_library: optional(string) }))), skewed_info: optional(list(object({ skewed_column_names: list(string), skewed_column_value_location_maps: map(string), skewed_column_values: list(string) }))), sort_columns: optional(list(object({ column: string, sort_order: number }))) }))

target_table.description: Configuration for the target_table block specifying the target table details.
target_table.type: list(object({ catalog_id: string, database_name: string, name: string, region: string }))
